description: Value of an urn with n balls of type -1 and n+2 balls of type +1.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: W. M. Boyce, On a simple optimal stopping problem, Discr. Math., 5 (1973), 297-312.
formula: A(m, p) = 0 for m < 0 or p < 0. A(0, 0) = 0. A(1, 0) = -1. A(0, 1) = 1. Otherwise, A(m, p) = A(m - 1, p) + A(m, p - 1).B(m, p) = 0 for m < 0 or p < 0. Otherwise, B(m, p) = max{0, A(m, p) + B(m - 1, p) + B(m, p - 1)}.a(n) = B(n, n + 2). - _Sean A. Irvine_, Feb 02 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: More terms and title clarified by _Sean A. Irvine_, Feb 02 2015
